|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;;OpenWrt;

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/06/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAFN26TX8272 |asin = B07712LKJM |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9887; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 433 |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [[File:ar750_shop-7.jpg|center|600px]]
===Features=== * Powered by [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 WiSoC (@650MHz CPU) * 300Mbps (2.4GHz) + 433Mbps (5GHz) high speed * 16MB (NOR) Flash; 128MB (DDR2) RAM * Support external storage up to 128GB * OpenWrt/LEDE pre-installed * Small, light, easy to use
==Links of Interest== ===Official Supports=== :[https://store.gl-inet.com/collections/travel-routers/products/gl-ar750-travel-ac-router Official Shop] :[https://forum.gl-inet.com/ Official Forum]
===Mention=== *[https://forum.lede-project.org/t/best-no-brainer-easy-to-flash-easy-to-buy-cheap-router-with-usb/8637/7 ''LEDE Project forum''] <small> "GL.inet has just released their new GL-AR750. I do not know that any one actually has seen these yet, but all their products come with OpenWrt pre-installed, so upgrading is easy. GL.inet products come with their proprietary GUI over OpenWrt (you can use either).
All the older products are available in LEDE (no GL.inet GUI), however the AR300M does not have a supported NAND version in LEDE, just the NOR. GL.inet offers “clean” firmware (no GL.inet GUI) and there is a version of the NAND :on OpenWrt). Their 2.263 firmware contains the KRACK patches." </small>
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/gl.inet/gl.inet_gl-ar750 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/gl.inet/gl-ar750 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ar71xx-ath79 |subtarget = generic |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
